it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.rmi

Class RMIServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.rmi.server.RemoteObject
      • java.rmi.server.RemoteServer
        • java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
          • it.polimi.ingsw.network.server.rmi.RMIServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    NetworkHandler, RemoteInterface, ServerInterface, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Runnable, java.rmi.Remote

    public class RMIServer
extends java.rmi.server.UnicastRemoteObject
implements java.lang.Runnable, RemoteInterface, ServerInterface
    This class is the RMIServer implementation
    Author:
    Francesco Masciulli
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

        public java.util.ArrayList<Event> ping()

        Returns:

        public void clientConnectionGuard()
                           throws java.rmi.RemoteException

        clientConnectionGuard in interface RemoteInterface

        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • remoteSendBroadcast

        public void remoteSendBroadcast(Event message)
                         throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        This method set, on each RemoteClient, the current message and wait for 100 milliSeconds between each setting
        Specified by:
        remoteSendBroadcast in interface RemoteInterface
        Parameters:
        message - is the Event that must be sent
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if couldn't reach the server
